@Kami Nana: I second on your comment. This author really wanted to fuck up our brains or show how fucked up the characters are when FMC claims her supposedly "love". When you are touched by true love, this story will look like shit to you, meaningless. You will feel no doubt, you won't even question how love should be. Again, hentai logic is always fucked up, it's a work of fiction and should treat it as such.

@Ary369 Exactly. Like the former porn star turned gamer/vlogger on YouTube, Paige Jennings(RedHeadRedemption). She said on there, too, that she prefers normal sized dicks for the same reason. Bigger dicks feel good in the moment, because as she says, the pleasure and pain kinda mix...but after the pleasure wears off...all that's left is agony. Moreover, the author apparently never touched or been touched by someone they actually love. Being touched by someone you love feels immensely good. Like electric fire/warmth... This is something these NTR stories never get right...or they do and it just shows how little the girls actually love the ones they claim to love. :/

@zikakuto I doubt they're still together. The Japanese part in quotations means something like "Farewell, My Love." Not to mention the boyfriend's reactions at the end...he clearly wants no part of her after he's seen what she's become and how little she actually cares for him. That said, she doesn't seem at all torn up at the end that they're no longer together...so just goes to show how fake her feelings were for her "boyfriend". Also, this isn't hentai logic...hentai at least usually still has them think in somewhat logical ways...they're just horny people that want to fuck and their inhibitions are barely there. This is NTR logic...goes far beyond hentai logic and tosses logic and rational thought processes completely out the window.

The author not have sexual experience yet, size doesn't matter. There are several video from YOUTUBE [ASK PORNSTAR] check out there. The bigger the dick, the bigger pain for woman. I don't know why in NTR stories big dick always win and the MC always have smallest dick. So many concept like that...

@Kami Nana , yeah for sure, it’s just hentai logic. NTR like this is so out-there crazy that I can’t take it seriously haha.

The gift is a good point, maybe she wears it to remember. Or maybe the author is hinting they stayed together. It’s left a little open ended so maybe we can choose our own headcanon ending. I’d prefer a breakup.
@jlbbmt10 Doesn't mean anything. It could just be something she wears now that he's no longer around to remember him by...perhaps some modicum of regret makes her wear it.

Please, please tell me he told her to get lost. She loves him, my ass. If she really loved him, his touch would feel great to her regardless of how much she prefers the other guy's size. Sexual pleasure isn't just derived from physical stimuli, but emotional stimuli as well. Maybe the author isn't aware of that because he's a virgin...or just doesn't know sexual psychology. Or they are and it shows how little he really meant to her despite her lying to herself.
